text: Eteke yetiya amara taraphara paraa sihamtara ocarata satya ahi pale, tetiya sihamte ka’balai dharaile, ‘muchaka yi diya haichila, te'omko tenekuraa diya naha’la kiya’? (Tente koraacona) itipurbe muchaka yi diya haichila seya sihamte asbikara karaa nachilane? Sihamte kaichila, ‘duyota'i yadu, eta'i anatoka samarthana karae’. Arau sihamte kaichila, ‘niscaya ami etako namano’
